title: Smart Data Models - Traffic Environment Impact Forecast
description: Environmental Impact expectations of traffic based on the vehicles traffic and their emission characteristics

type.description: Property. NGSI type. it has to be TrafficEnvironmentImpactForecast

co2.description: Property. The measured C02 emission concentration. Units:'mg/L'

vehicleClass.description: Property. enumeration of the vehicle classes

trafficIntensity.description: Property. Total number of vehicle of emission range defined by the vehicle class

averageVehicleSpeed.description: Property. Total number of vehicle of emission range defined by the vehicle class

averageOccupancy.description: Property. The average number of people in vehicles of emission range defined by  the vehicle class

validFrom.description: Property. The start of the validity period for this forecast as a ISO8601 format

validTo.description: Property. The end of the validity period for this forecast as a ISO8601 format

validity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Includes the validity period for this forecast as a ISO8601 time interval.

dateIssued.description: Property. The date and time the forecast was issued by the service provider in ISO8601 UTC format.
